SEARCH
Package me.bristermitten.mittenlib.gui

Interface GUIBase<Model,Msg,View,Ctx extends CommandContext,Cmd extends Command<Ctx,Msg>>

Type Parameters:
Model - the type of the model that holds the state of the application
Msg - the type of messages that can be executed to update the model
View - the type of view that renders the model and waits for commands
Cmd - the type of commands that can be sent to perform side effects
All Known Implementing Classes:
DemoCounterGUI, SpigotGUI
public interface GUIBase<Model,Msg,View,Ctx extends CommandContext,Cmd extends Command<Ctx,Msg>>
Base interface for GUI applications, based on the Elm Architecture (Model-View-Update / TEA).
